name: Space Panda
description:
\\ We recommend you to play with a controller for more comfort //

A journey begins for your panda who wants to collect space bamboos to seduce his lover.

Use your keyboard (A,D and Space) or your controller (RB, LB, A) to control your panda.

Will you succeed to conquer the heart of your beloved panda lover?

The Team :

Kamiyue (Camille Decressain)

Deady (Ludovic Bouron)

Emunicorn (Emma Magunar)

Kashikago (Hugo Leang)
